quote: Dropped in my messy folders, and within minutes, everything was sorted and labeled. It’s like the AI knew exactly what I needed!
I asked the agent to find old college docs, and boom—transcripts, essays, and scans surfaced instantly. Unreal.
Setup was instant. I connected my cloud drives and suddenly had one clean dashboard. No more digging through emails or folders!
Told the AI to organize my project files by topic—and it did, better than I could’ve manually. Super clean.
This app redefined how I handle my files. Everything's searchable, tagged, and backed up, with zero effort on my part.
Uploaded thousands of PDFs, and the smart agent sorted, renamed, and even summarized them for me. Total time saver.
Followed the getting started guide and had my local and cloud files unified in minutes. Genuinely impressive.
Shared a folder link, and the agent auto-organized everything before my team even opened it. Unreal productivity boost.
I asked the agent where my receipts and contracts were—it gave me a clean list, categorized. Like magic.
Searched 'tax documents 2022', and everything popped up in one click, across all drives. The AI is shockingly good.
